basics.label: Business Development Executive
basics.summary: Accomplished sales professional with 20 years of business development and account management experience in both the private and public sector; healthcare, education and government. Adept at managing intense demands of multiple existing customer accounts and cultivates strong customer relationships.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Experience in delivering profitable, multi-year national and corporate contracts to companies with 400+ employees. Responsible for business-building and relationship-building expectations through long selling cycles with unique accounts.
highlights: Selected to the Staples NAC Green Team.
Successfully grew account base to 14 new customers.
Generated $3.5 million in new business acquisition.
Recipient of BDE All Star award.
Closed $700,000 in furniture for customer's new corporate headquarters.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for customer acquisition, retention and expansion and all e-commerce training and development.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed largest corporate accounts in seven states and executed marketing and advertising promotions.
highlights: Met or exceeded all quotas throughout tenure and increased market share in accounts.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Effectively communicated and coordinated execution of the planogram with store management and managed the purchasing process for the entire department.
highlights: Arranged items in favorable positions and areas of the store for optimal sales.
